CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.location_attribute AS SELECT la.id, l.name AS location, a.name AS attribute, b.name AS product_value, la.text_value, la.integer_value, r.name AS updated_by, la.update_date FROM ruleform.location_attribute la JOIN ruleform.location l ON la.location = l.id JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON la.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product b ON la.product_value = b.id JOIN ruleform.agency r ON la.updated_by = r.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.location_attribute OWNER TO core;
